titleStmt.title: The Greeke postscripts of the epistles to Timothy and Titus cleared in Parliament. And an occasional speech touching the bill of acapitation, or poll-money. By Sir Simonds D'Ewes.
titleStmt.author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.

notesStmt.note: Text printed partly in red and black.
